newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Microsoft's EPS view said raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Microsoft's EPS view said raised.

text.p: -- A source at Goldman Sachs & Co said the brokerage firm has raised forecasts for Microsoft's 1997 and 1998 profits.
-- In 1997, the software leader is projected to earn $2.35 a share, the source said. Previously, 1997 earnings had been forecast at $2.02 by Goldman.
-- For 1998, Goldman is targetting earnings of $2.75 a share, up from its previous view of $2.40. The stock was kept on Goldman's recommended list, the source said.
-- Microsoft Corp shares closed at 87-1/8 on Friday, before it posted second quarter earnings of $0.57 a share.
